content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex at position(x=37-41, y=-83 to -87)
Consists of following entities:
- 4 Burner mining drills at positions (41.0,-86.0), (37.0,-85.0), (39.0,-85.0), (41.0,-83.0)
- 4 Wooden chests at positions (40.5,-87.5), (36.5,-86.5), (39.5,-83.5)
- 2 Burner inserters at positions (35.5,-86.5), (35.5,-85.5)
All drills are currently out of fuel but positioned over coal resources

### Iron/Copper Ore Processing at position(x=-28, y=-61)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0,-61.0) mining iron and copper ore
- Wooden chest at (-27.5,-59.5) storing mined ore
- Stone furnace at (-27.0,-58.0) for smelting
- Burner inserters at (-26.5,-59.5), (-25.5,-58.5) for material movement
- Output chest at (-24.5,-58.5) storing processed plates

### Iron Ore Mining Complex at position(x=-10 to -6, y=-59)
Consists of following entities:
- 3 Burner mining drills at positions (-10.0,-59.0), (-8.0,-59.0), (-6.0,-59.0)
- Multiple wooden chests at (-9.5,-57.5), (-7.5,-57.5), (-5.5,-57.5)
- Transport belt system connecting components
- Multiple burner inserters for material movement

### Smelting Array at position(x=0 to 6, y=0)
Consists of following entities:
- 4 Stone furnaces at (0.0,0.0), (2.0,0.0), (4.0,0.0), (6.0,0.0)
- Input chests at (0.5,-2.5), (2.5,-2.5), (4.5,-2.5), (6.5,-2.5)
- Output chests at (0.5,2.5), (2.5,2.5), (4.5,2.5), (6.5,2.5)
- Multiple burner inserters for material movement

### Power Generation System at position(x=-3.5 to 4.5, y=17-27)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-3.5,27.5)
- Boiler at (-1.5,22.0)
- Steam engine at (4.5,20.5)
- Pipe network connecting components
- Small electric poles creating power network

ERROR TIPS

### Extraction errors
- Must be within interaction range of the target chest/entity when attempting to extract items
- Verify the chest contains the items you're trying to extract before extraction

### Entity placement errors
- Check if target position is clear before placing new entities
- Ensure proper spacing between entities according to their tile dimensions

### Resource and fuel management
- Multiple burner mining drills are out of fuel - implement fuel distribution system
- Boiler is out of fuel - needs coal supply system

### Fluid system issues
- Steam engine shows "no input liquid" - ensure proper pipe connections between boiler and engine
- Verify fluid flow direction in pipe networks
